    initializeViews() - Method in class view.entityViews.EnemyView
    clears and re-populates the EnemyView.droneViews and the EnemyView.dogViews array lists with new DogView or DroneView, by checking the Room's enemies.
    initializeViews() - Method in class view.interactableObjectsViews.InteractableObjectsView
    scans the InteractableObjectsView.currentRoom's interactive objects, and creates each view.
    initializeWorldLayout() - Method in class model.levels.LevelManager
    initializes the default game world in the LevelManager.worldLayout.
